text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Nakayama Racecourse at year's end! Which Umamusume will claim the final honor of the year?

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: But honestly, she's been outstanding lately, so I guess it's gotta be Biwa Hayahide!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: That's not true, it's Machitan! Machitan can win, absolutely, absolutely...!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Oh, really? You're a fan of Tannhauser?

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Yeah! ...I'm not that fast myself. But that's why I like Machitan!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: You like Machitan because you're not fast yourself...?

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Hehe. I get it, what you're trying to say. Like, everyone's representative.

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: That's why you can relate and feel encouraged. You can genuinely think they're amazing.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: I see...

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Plus, her clumsy side is cute too. Like the other day, she got too pumped up and ended up not racing.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: This morning, she almost drank a spider that had invaded her rice bowl, too.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: It was good her trainer stopped her, but...

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, really? So cute—wait, huh, Ikuno and Turbo!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Go! Machitan! Nature!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hayahide! I've heard all sorts of rumors about you.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But it doesn't matter! Today, I'm the one who's gonna win!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: ...Hehe. A comeback race in name only. I've returned even stronger.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: But I won't yield victory either. Fair and square, I look forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yeah...!
The two exchange a firm handshake and start walking toward the turf—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wait a second!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm here too!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You're loud.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I've decided today, today... I'll walk in the middle, win—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: —and take the 'protagonist' role!!
Until now, Matikanetannhauser had been careful not to get in the way of other Umamusume when walking in the underground passage. As she says—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: For example, look, during the climax of a movie, when rivals share a passionate handshake—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: —an ordinary person doesn't just barge in between them, right?
And today, she's declaring she'll walk in the middle. Yes, in other words, today is just that—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm serious!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I know! You know, I've heard all sorts of rumors about you too. I've definitely been keeping an eye on you!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I don't plan on losing either. I won't give up the 'protagonist' role. So... let's have a good race today!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Same here. I've researched all your data.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: If today's winner is called the 'protagonist,' I have no intention of giving it up either.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That's exactly what I want!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: And Nature here too! I don't plan on losing, you know!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh!? No, I... well... I'm going to win today!
With that, the four of them exchanged glances and together, they left the underground passage—
Just when I thought that, only Matikanetannhauser came back.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hey hey, I forgot something! There was something I wanted to do!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Um, could you say a cheer with me? Because today is, you know, a special day.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehe. Alright, here we go!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: "Arima Kinen," let's do our best! Heave, ho--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yesss! Alright, I'm off!
